properties.entry: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PW = ?

SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, MEMO_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS WRITE_DATE, TO_CHAR(UPDATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO FROM MEMO WHERE MEMBER_NO = ?
UPDATE MEMO SET MEMO_TITLE = ?, MEMO_CONTENT =? WHERE MEMO_NO = ?
SELECT MEMO_NO, MEMO_TITLE, MEMO_CONTENT, WRITE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, MEMBER_NO FROM MEMO WHERE MEMO_NO = ?
